sentences.sContent: The comments on webcam sites are rife with anthropomorphism, not surprisingly, and even when this is pointed out, the contributors are often undaunted.
sentences.sContent_eng: The comments on webcam sites are rife with anthropomorphism, not surprisingly, and even when this is pointed out, the contributors are often undaunted.
sentences.sCn: 不出意外的，在动物直播网站里充满了各种拟人化的评论，虽然已经有人指出，但是那些评论者却从不更改。

trans.tranOther: the belief that animals or objects have the same feelings and qualities as humans
